channel.title: My webclient
channel.description: I have a 503 client that I've made into a webclient, it works perfectly, but it will only work on localhost. I have no clue why it keeps doing this, I have tried everything but it still stays on localhost..... please help me out

item.title: My webclient
item.dc:creator: @sir_henry1 sir henry1
item.description:
@sir_henry1 wrote:

I already checked all that, its not in client.class, its in gui.class and its changed slready, could t have to do with me jarrng it?

Read full topic

item.title: My webclient
item.dc:creator: @Randon1 Randon1
item.description:
@Randon1 wrote:

Go to client.class ( i know it comes out all fucked up ) but search for either a “no-ip”, “127.0.0.1”, or “0.0.0.0” (no quotes). And change that to your no-ip or whatever your using. I had the same problem until i found that. I changed it and it worked perfectly. i hope this help you out bro Goodluck on your server.

Read full topic

item.title: My webclient
item.dc:creator: @sir_henry1 sir henry1
item.description:
@sir_henry1 wrote:

x1 att ftw x:

Go into Client.Java or Gui or Even EGUI and change the client ip to your own rejar and upload

thats the problem… Its been changed for like a year and it still doesnt work =P

Read full topic
